00008 CairoPainter::CairoPainter() {
00009         absx = absy = 0;
00010         debugdrawtext = false;
00011         fittext = true;
00012 
00013     m_seriffont = "serif";
00014     m_sansseriffont = "sans-serif";
00015     m_scriptfont = "script";
00016     m_monofont = "monospace";
00017     m_foreground.setRgb(0,0,0);
00018     m_background.setRgb(255,255,255);
00019     m_highlight.setRgb(255,0,0);
00020     m_selection.setRgb(0,255,0);
00021     m_fontsize = 12;
00022 }
00023 void
00024 CairoPainter::setPainter(cairo_t *p) {
00025     m_painter = p;
00026     // initialise the painter
00027     cairo_set_antialias(m_painter, CAIRO_ANTIALIAS_GRAY);
00028     setFont(m_seriffont, m_fontsize);
00029 }
00030 void
00031 CairoPainter::setFont(const std::string &family, float size) {
00032     m_seriffont = family;
00033     m_fontsize = size;
00034     cairo_select_font_face(m_painter, m_seriffont.c_str(),
00035         CAIRO_FONT_SLANT_NORMAL, CAIRO_FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL);
00036     cairo_set_font_size(m_painter, size);
00037     cairo_font_extents(m_painter, &m_fontmetrics);
00038 }

00041         debugdrawtext = outline;

00059 float
00060 CairoPainter::stringWidth(const DOMString &s) const {
00061     cairo_text_extents(m_painter, s.utf8(), &m_textsize);
00062     return m_textsize.width;
00063 }
00064 /* Em
00065  * A font-relative measure encoded by the font. Before electronic typesetting,
00066  * an "em" was the width of an "M" in the font. In modern usage, an "em" is
00067  * either specified by the designer of the font or is taken to be the height
00068  * (point size) of the font. Em's are typically used for font-relative
00069  * horizontal sizes. */
00070 float
00071 CairoPainter::em() const {
00072     return stringWidth("M");
00073 }
00074 /* Ex
00075  * A font-relative measure that is the height of an "x" in the font. "ex"s are
00076  * typically used for font-relative vertical sizes. */
00077 float
00078 CairoPainter::ex() const {
00079     cairo_text_extents(m_painter, "x", &m_textsize);
00080     return m_textsize.height;
00081 }
00082 MathColor
00083 CairoPainter::mathColor() const {
00084         return m_foreground;
00085 }
00086 MathColor
00087 CairoPainter::highlightColor(uchar level) const {
00088         MathColor mc;
00089         int r, g, b;
00090         int lm = int(pow(2,level));
00091         r = (m_highlight.r() - m_background.r())/lm + m_background.r();
00092         g = (m_highlight.g() - m_background.g())/lm + m_background.g();
00093         b = (m_highlight.b() - m_background.b())/lm + m_background.b();
00094         mc.setRgb(r, g, b);
00095         return mc;
00096 }
00097 MathColor
00098 CairoPainter::selectionColor() const {
00099         return m_selection;
00100 }
00101 void
00102 CairoPainter::setMathVariant(MathVariant mv) {
00103         switch (mv) {
00104         case (NORMAL):
00105         cairo_select_font_face(m_painter, m_seriffont.c_str(),
00106             CAIRO_FONT_SLANT_NORMAL, CAIRO_FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL);
00107                 break;
00108         case (BOLD):
00109         cairo_select_font_face(m_painter, m_seriffont.c_str(),
00110             CAIRO_FONT_SLANT_NORMAL, CAIRO_FONT_WEIGHT_BOLD);
00111                 break;
00112         case (ITALIC):
00113         cairo_select_font_face(m_painter, m_seriffont.c_str(),
00114             CAIRO_FONT_SLANT_ITALIC, CAIRO_FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL);
00115                 break;
00116         case (BOLD_ITALIC):
00117         cairo_select_font_face(m_painter, m_seriffont.c_str(),
00118             CAIRO_FONT_SLANT_ITALIC, CAIRO_FONT_WEIGHT_BOLD);
00119                 break;
00120         case (DOUBLE_STRUCK): break;
00121         case (BOLD_FRAKTUR): break;
00122         case (SCRIPT):
00123         cairo_select_font_face(m_painter, m_scriptfont.c_str(),
00124             CAIRO_FONT_SLANT_NORMAL, CAIRO_FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL);
00125                 break;
00126         case (BOLD_SCRIPT):
00127         cairo_select_font_face(m_painter, m_scriptfont.c_str(),
00128             CAIRO_FONT_SLANT_NORMAL, CAIRO_FONT_WEIGHT_BOLD);
00129                 break;
00130         case (FRAKTUR): break;
00131         case (SANS_SERIF):
00132         cairo_select_font_face(m_painter, m_sansseriffont.c_str(),
00133             CAIRO_FONT_SLANT_NORMAL, CAIRO_FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL);
00134                 break;
00135         case (BOLD_SANS_SERIF):
00136         cairo_select_font_face(m_painter, m_sansseriffont.c_str(),
00137             CAIRO_FONT_SLANT_NORMAL, CAIRO_FONT_WEIGHT_BOLD);
00138                 break;
00139         case (SANS_SERIF_ITALIC):
00140         cairo_select_font_face(m_painter, m_sansseriffont.c_str(),
00141             CAIRO_FONT_SLANT_ITALIC, CAIRO_FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL);
00142                 break;
00143         case (SANS_SERIF_BOLD_ITALIC):
00144         cairo_select_font_face(m_painter, m_sansseriffont.c_str(),
00145             CAIRO_FONT_SLANT_ITALIC, CAIRO_FONT_WEIGHT_BOLD);
00146                 break;
00147         case (MONOSPACE):
00148         cairo_select_font_face(m_painter, m_monofont.c_str(),
00149             CAIRO_FONT_SLANT_NORMAL, CAIRO_FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL);
00150                 break;
00151         }
00152     cairo_font_extents(m_painter, &m_fontmetrics);
00153 }
00154 void
00155 CairoPainter::setMathColor(MathColor mc) {
00156         if (mc.isTransparent()) {
00157                 // mathcolor cannot be transparent, only background can
00158         cairo_set_source_rgba(m_painter, 0, 0, 0, 1);
00159         } else {
00160         cairo_set_source_rgb(m_painter, mc.r()/256.0, mc.g()/256.0,
00161             mc.b()/256.0);
00162         }
00163 }

00166 //    m_background = mc;
00167 }

00175 CairoPainter::setLineThickness(float t) { // thickness in px
00176     cairo_set_line_width(m_painter, t);

00182 void
00183 CairoPainter::drawLine(float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2,
00184                 float linethickness) {
00185         if (linethickness <= 0) {
00186         linethickness = 1;
00187     }
00188     float t = cairo_get_line_width(m_painter);
00189     cairo_set_line_width(m_painter, linethickness);
00190 
00191     cairo_move_to(m_painter, x1+absx, y1+absy);
00192     cairo_line_to(m_painter, x2+absx, y2+absy);
00193     cairo_stroke(m_painter);
00194 
00195     cairo_set_line_width(m_painter, t);
00196 }
00197 void
00198 CairoPainter::drawRect(float x, float y, float w, float h) {
00199     cairo_rectangle(m_painter, x+absx, y+absy, w, h);
00200     cairo_stroke(m_painter);
00201 }
00202 void
00203 CairoPainter::fillRect(float x, float y, float w, float h, const MathColor &bg,
00204                 const MathColor &fg) {
00205     cairo_save(m_painter);
00206     setMathColor(bg);
00207     cairo_rectangle(m_painter, x+absx, y+absy, w, h);
00208     cairo_fill(m_painter);
00209     setMathColor(fg);
00210     cairo_rectangle(m_painter, x+absx, y+absy, w, h);
00211     cairo_stroke(m_painter);
00212     cairo_restore(m_painter);
00213 }
00214 void
00215 CairoPainter::fillParallelogram(float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2,
00216                 float x3, float y3) {
00217     x1 += absx;
00218     y1 += absy;
00219     x2 += absx;
00220     y2 += absy;
00221     cairo_move_to(m_painter, x1, y1);
00222     cairo_line_to(m_painter, x1, y2);
00223     cairo_line_to(m_painter, x2, y2);
00224     cairo_line_to(m_painter, x2, y1);
00225     cairo_line_to(m_painter, x1, y1);
00226     cairo_fill(m_painter);
00227 }
00228 void
00229 CairoPainter::drawPolygon(int n, float *x, float *y) {
00230     if (n <= 0) return;
00231 
00232     cairo_move_to(m_painter, x[n-1]+absx, y[n-1]+absy);
00233         for (int i=0; i<n; ++i) {
00234         cairo_line_to(m_painter, x[i]+absx, y[i]+absy);
00235         }
00236     cairo_fill(m_painter);
00237 }
00238 void
00239 CairoPainter::drawText(const DOMString &s) {
00240     if (debugdrawtext) {
00241         drawOutline(stringWidth(s));
00242     }
00243     cairo_move_to(m_painter, absx, absy);
00244     cairo_show_text(m_painter, s.utf8());
00245 }
00246 /* draw the string s with current font, but stretch it to fit the given
00247    width (a+d). We haven't implemented stretching, so i just center the character. */
00248 void
00249 CairoPainter::drawText(const DOMString &s, float w) {
00250         float sw = stringWidth(s) + absx; // this can't be right
00251         float hdiff = w - sw;
00252     cairo_move_to(m_painter, hdiff/2+absx, absy);
00253     cairo_show_text(m_painter, s.utf8());
00254 }
00255 /* draw the string s with current font, but stretch it to fit the given
00256    height (a+d). Keep the width the same as the width specified by
00257    stringWidth(s); */
00258 void
00259 CairoPainter::drawText(const DOMString &s, float a, float d) {
00260     drawText(s);
00261 }
00262 void
00263 CairoPainter::drawOutline(float w) {
00264     float a = fontAscent();
00265     float d = fontDescent();
00266          // total character area
00267     cairo_save(m_painter);
00268     cairo_set_source_rgb(m_painter, 1, 0, 0);
00269     cairo_rectangle(m_painter, absx, absy-a, w, a);
00270     cairo_fill(m_painter);
00271     cairo_set_source_rgb(m_painter, 0, 0, 1);
00272     cairo_rectangle(m_painter, absx, absy, w, d);
00273     cairo_fill(m_painter);
00274     cairo_restore(m_painter);
00275 }
00276 void
00277 CairoPainter::drawText(const DOMString &s, float w, float a, float d) {
00278         float sw = stringWidth(s);
00279         float hdiff = w-sw;
00280         float fa = fontAscent();
00281         float fd = fontDescent();
00282         float vdiff = d-fd - a+fa;
00283     cairo_move_to(m_painter, hdiff/2, vdiff/2);
00284     cairo_show_text(m_painter, s.utf8());
00285 }
00286 void
00287 CairoPainter::translate(float x, float y) {
00288         absx += x;
00289         absy += y;
00290 }
